Book1155_EN.txt:
(New text appears after a few blank pages. Most of it relates to the Narzissenkreuz Ordo, so abstruse that prolonged study leaves one busy.)
(Mixed in are a few offhand comments, which look like Sandrone's recent jottings.)

...

■ / ■ - Heavy Snow

Capitano chose to stay in Natlan. Shame.

...

■ / ■ - Sunny

Columbina hasn't been faring well since she resigned. Ha. Serves her right. I did warn her to think carefully before making such decisions. But she wouldn't listen.

...

The materials Arlecchino provided were extensive. I owe her my thanks.
Important: Send gifts to the House of the Hearth, one for every child.

...

A new project, and I have to collaborate with Dottore?! I can't help but feel some resentment toward Her Majesty for this...

...

But Her Majesty's plan... it must succeed.

...

Gods, Columbina, can you stop being <color=#e72613>so...</color> <color=#1dd215>such</color> <color=#e72613>annoying</color> <color=#1dd215>a problem</color>!?

...

Pulonia's situation is stable. Optimizing algorithmic logic. Expecting several hours of downtime.
A meeting with Arlecchino. Duration: 20 minutes.
Tea break with Arlecchino. Duration: 1 hour.

...
